import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { fetchCart } from "../redux/action/cart"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import img1 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo1.jpg"; import img2 from "../assets/imgs/shampoo2.jpg"; import AddressForm from "./AddressForm"; import PaymentMethod from "./PaymentMethod"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getImage } from "../utils"; const Checkout = ({ fetchCart, cart }) => { useEffect(() => { fetchCart(); }, []); let cartItems = cart?.order_items; console.log(cart); document.title = `Checkout ( ${cart?.order_items.length} items ) | Luxury Silk Online`; return ( <>

Home/ Order Summary/Checkout

Checkout

Delivery address

Order summary

{cartItems && cartItems.map((item) => (
{item?.quantity}

{item?.item}

{item?.item_obj.weight} / {item?.item_obj.category} /{" "} Peppermint

KSh. {item?.final_price}

))}

Subtotal

KSh. {cart?.total}

Shipping

Calculated at next step

Total

KSh. {cart?.total}

); }; const mapStateToProps = (state) => ({ cart: state.cart.shoppingCart, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, { fetchCart })(Checkout);
